tool.name: tool_2

param.name: SEED_TYPE
param.dialogReference:
Seed Type

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] minima of variance

[1] maxima of variance

Default: 0

param.name: METHOD
param.dialogReference:
Method

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] band width smoothing

[1] band width search

Default: 0

param.name: NORMALIZE
param.dialogReference:
Normalize Features

Boolean

Default: 0

Standardize the input features, i.e. rescale the input data (features) such that the mean equals 0 and the standard deviation equals 1. This is helpful when the input features have different scales, units or outliers.

param.name: DW_WEIGHTING
param.dialogReference:
Weighting Function

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] no distance weighting

[1] inverse distance to a power

[2] exponential

[3] gaussian

Default: 0

param.name: DW_BANDWIDTH
param.dialogReference:
Bandwidth

Floating point

Minimum: 0.000000

Default: 1.000000

Bandwidth for exponential and Gaussian weighting

tool.summary: The tool allows one to create seed points from a stack of input features. Such seed points can be used, for example, as input in the 'Seeded Region Growing' tool.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
